def route_register(data):
    return register(data.get("username"), data.get("password"))

def route_login(data):
    return login(data.get("username"), data.get("password"))

def route_logout(token):
    return logout(token)

def hash_password(pw: str) -> str:
    return hashlib.sha256(pw.encode()).hexdigest()

def add_user(username, password_hash):
    USERS[username] = password_hash

def get_user_hash(username):
    return USERS.get(username)

// fe/utils/http.js
export async function get(url){ return fetch(url).then(r=>r.json()); }

export async function post(url, body){
  return fetch(url, { method: "POST", headers: {"Content-Type":"application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify(body)})

.then(r=>r.json());
}

    USERS[username] = password_hash

    return USERS.get(username)
